member.name: T:Xunit.StaFactAttribute
member.summary: Identifies an xunit test that starts on an STA thread.

member.name: T:Xunit.UIFactAttribute
member.summary: Identifies an xunit test that starts on an STA thread with a UI thread-like SynchronizationContext.

member.name: T:Xunit.WpfFactAttribute
member.summary: Identifies an xunit test that starts on an STA thread with a WPF DispatcherSynchronizationContext.

member.name: T:Xunit.WpfTheoryAttribute
member.summary: Identifies an xunit theory that starts on an STA thread with a WPF DispatcherSynchronizationContext.
